channel.title: Need help with shops on 317 server please read
channel.description: hey i was wondering how can i change shops around like i dont wanna change items in the shops but swapshops like for staffzone i wanna put the shop thats in home and the shop thats it home i want in staffzone. can someone explain how to do this thanks...

item.title: Need help with shops on 317 server please read
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

joelx617:

ok well the comiler is fine and o is everything else. im running off my 317 mustanscap3 server . and i dont know hwo to change the shops like i want to swap 1 shop ito my staffzone and my staffzone shop to change it to wher the normal shop is how would i do this cuz i cant find the item id for these npcs etc…

I will do an example for you.

if shop 3 = archer shop in shops.cfg
you would go to autospawn.cfg and find ranger or archer. That npc for example for me is 683.

Now find that information with another shop.

You would do the following to swap.

go to autospawn.cfg and swap coords from the first npc to the second npc and replace the second npc coords with the first npc.
then go to shops.cfg and change the shop numbers around.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with shops on 317 server please read
